level.heading: Homeownership counseling.
level.text: A lender shall inform a borrower of his or her right to obtain counseling in connection with a covered loan. A Red Flag Warning Disclosure Notice shall satisfy this requirement.

level.heading: Emergency legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see § 219 of Home Loan Protection Emergency Act of 2002 (D.C. Act 14-295, March 1, 2002, 49 DCR 2534).
